title: frug
description: A digital art print featuring a frog on a penny-farthing. In the bottom right corner, two flies are seen riding a tandem bike, with one of them falling off, as well as a ladybird struggling to stay on a unicycle.

title: fax
description: A digital art piece of a dapper fox wearing a vintage three-piece suit and holding a hat in its front left paw.

title: sleth
description: A digital artwork of a stylish sloth posing in a three-piece suit.
